ObjectClass.Name: Elder (Achron)
ObjectClass.Description:
ELDER: Achronal bio-cybernetic command shell Container for Achron AI (i.e. you)
Engages Temporal Shield when endangered Generates QP and Power Can revert LC to QP Can revive frozen units

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 25, Aggro Radius: 35 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 40, R 32, SR 2, Sta S\Air: 40, R 32, SR 2, Sta S

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Recover Status
Objective.Details: \Clear negative status effects:\ Freeze and Nanites

Objective.Name: Revert LCrystal -> QPlasma
Objective.Details: \Convert 200 L-Crystal to Q-Plasma\converts 2.5 QP/s over 80 s \ \200 LC + 80 E = 200 QP

ObjectClass.Name: Damaged Elder
ObjectClass.Description:
ELDER:
Achronal bio-cybernetic command shell Local container for Achron AI (i.e. you)
This unit has engaged its Temporal Shield due to excessive local threat level (50 s duration)
